desc: Hire plants for your business or event from Live Décor and get complimentary ongoing Plant Care. We're based in Whangarei and visit your space to design your interior plantscape. We deliver, install & collect on time as part of the Plant Hire service. Contact us today.

layout.text: THIS IS MORE THAN PLANT HIRE, THIS IS PLANT CARE
We're an indoor plant nursery that never stops nurturing. Our Plant Hire installations & ongoing Plant Care have breathed life to businesses & events across Northland & Auckland for over 30 years.
